title: Hong Kong: Stocks open slightly lower on Wednesday
text:
Hong Kong stocks edged down in the first few minutes of Wednesday as investors await the conclusion of Federal Reserve's latest policy meeting with expectations for another interest rate cut already priced in.

[HONG KONG] Hong Kong stocks edged down in the first few minutes of Wednesday as investors await the conclusion of Federal Reserve's latest policy meeting with expectations for another interest rate cut already priced in.

The Hang Seng Index dipped 0.07 per cent, or 19.78 points, to 26,766.98.

AFP
description: : THE BUSINESS TIMES Stocks - [HONG KONG] Hong Kong stocks edged down in the first few minutes of Wednesday as investors await the conclusion of Federal Reserve's latest policy meeting with expectations for another interest rate cut already priced in. .
